alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Wasatch Back; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 7:27AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT WEBER...SOUTHERN CACHE...EAST CENTRAL BOX ELDER...WEST CENTRAL RICH...NORTHWESTERN SALT LAKE... DAVIS...SOUTHWESTERN MORGAN AND EAST CENTRAL TOOELE COUNTIES... At 725 AM MDT...an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from Grantsville to near Kaysville to 7 miles east of Hyrum...and moving east at 20 mph. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Ogden, Layton, Bountiful, Tooele, Farmington, Brigham City, Grantsville, Tremonton, Morgan, Hill Air Force Base, West Jordan, Taylorsville, Roy, Clearfield, Kaysville, Syracuse, South Salt Lake and Clinton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 305 and 379. Interstate 84 between mile markers 42 and 106. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 84 and 119. * winds in excess of 25 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow. * visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow. * UDOT sensors indicate that roads have quickly become icy beneath this band. Drivers should expect rapidly worsening conditions and be prepared for slick conditions. Reduce speeds.
